snippet: The home team in N.C.A.A. basketball plays with its preferred ball during the regular season, and because each brand has a distinct feel, it is another reason it is hard to play on the road.
abstract: NCAA rules allow the home basketball team to play with its preferred ball during the regular season, and because each brand of basketball has a distinct feel, it is another reason it is hard to play on the road.
